content: garter stitch baby jacket top down - no sew - knitting for profit friendly this simple classic baby jacket in garter stitch is always a big hit with everyone babies love the comfortable fit and luxurious softness of the yarns and moms love the elegant look and stylish details the fit is comfortable giving you ease for fitting and baby lots of room for growing you will love knitting from the top down with no finishing other than sewing on the button and tucking in the ends by nancy elizabeth munroe © 2012 simply elegant timeless classics vintage appeal & heirloom quality garter stitch baby jacket top down - no sew - knitting for profit friendly skill level 2 easy skills required this is an easy project for beginners you will need to know how to do the knit purl and yarn over stitches knitting on 4 double pointed needles for the no sew sleeves is optional abbreviations used dp double point p purl st s stitch es k knit pm place marker yo yarn over k2tog knit 2 stitches together sm slip marker sizes 0-6 months 9-12 months 18-24 months finished measurements chest 21 23 25 53 58 5 63 5 cm body length 9 5 10 2 10 9 24 26 27 5 cm sleeve length 6 6 5 7 15 16 5 18 cm this garment is designed with lots of ease for an easy fit and longer wear materials yarn nancy elizabeth designs - handspun merino & silk dk weight or handspun merino/silk and angora 55 yards per 1 oz 28 gram skein 5 6 6 1 oz skeins choose any of our yarns in dk weight or choose another dk or light worsted weight yarn that will give you the correct gauge below needles us 6 4mm straight or circular needles whichever are most comfortable as we will be knitting back and forth as well as a set of 4 double pointed needles in the same size or in the size needed to get the correct gauge notions 8 stitch markers 1 focal point button scrap yarn or holders yarn needle gauge 18 sts and 34 row over 4 in 10 cm in garter stitch simply elegant timeless classics vintage appeal & heirloom quality garter stitch baby jacket top down - no sew - knitting for profit friendly pattern instructions beginning at the collar cast on 46 sts all sizes on size us6 4mm needle loosely do not join the cardigan is worked flat note always slip first st of every row purlwise with yarn in front for a smooth edge row 1-4 work 4 row in garter stitch knit every row row 5 and 6 cast on 5 5 5 sts at the beginning of the next 2 row for front bands - 56 sts all sizes raglan shaping - yoke row 1 all sizes place markers before and after each of 4 raglan seams as follows k13 front sts yo pm k2 pm
